theGap.title: Bridging the Industry-Academia Gap
theGap.subtitle: Most programs teach you to code. We train you to engineer.

floating.seatsLeft: {count, plural, =1 {Only 1 seat left!} other {Only {count} seats left!}}

trust.quote: "We don't promise jobs. We build developers who <highlight>earn</highlight> jobs."

analogy.title: The Career Progression
analogy.subtitle: Think of software development like building a cityâ€”each tier represents mastery of a different scale of responsibility.

junior.description: Like a skilled plumber executing precise blueprintsâ€”you master foundational tools and execute well-defined tasks with reliability and precision.

intermediate.description: Like a construction foreman integrating systemsâ€”you coordinate plumbing, electrical, and framing independently, ensure quality through testing, and handle unexpected issues.

senior.description: Like a city architect designing neighborhoodsâ€”you define scalable infrastructure, mitigate risks (zoning, security), and present strategic vision to stakeholders.

courses.title: The Engineer's Roadmap
courses.subtitle: A structured path from 'Hello World' to your first offer letter. We don't sell courses; we build careers.

tier1.title: Tier 1: Junior Developer Career Preparation
tier1.description: Enable students to efficiently execute well-defined programming tasks under guidance, while establishing foundational Computer Science knowledge, structured collaboration habits, and reliable persistence skills.

modules.title: Web Foundations & Git
modules.tech: Semantic HTML5, CSS3 (Flexbox/Grid), Responsive Design, ARIA, Git Workflow
modules.outcome: Personal Portfolio Website (fully responsive, accessible)
modules.details: Master foundational web technologies and version control. Build a professional portfolio demonstrating semantic structure and responsive design.

modules.title: Core JavaScript & Frontend
modules.tech: JavaScript ES6+ (scope, closures), DOM Manipulation, Promises, Async/Await, Big-O Notation
modules.outcome: API Integration Project (external read-only API)
modules.details: Deep dive into JavaScript fundamentals and asynchronous programming. Successfully integrate external APIs into dynamic web applications.

modules.title: Interview Fundamentals (DSA)
modules.tech: Data Structures (Array, LinkedList, Stack, Queue, HashMap, Tree, Graph), Algorithms (Two Pointers, Sliding Window, BFS/DFS, Binary Search)
modules.outcome: Weekly: 2 LeetCode Easy + 1 Medium. Biweekly: 45-min Mock Technical Screen
modules.details: Master foundational algorithms and data structures essential for technical interviews. Regular timed assessments build problem-solving speed.

modules.title: React Library Immersion
modules.tech: React JSX, Functional Components, Hooks (useState, useEffect), Client-side Routing, UI Libraries, Linting, Component Testing
modules.outcome: Component Library with Clean Git History
modules.details: Build production-quality React applications following modern best practices. Implement robust component architecture with proper testing.

modules.title: Backend, Persistence & Production Basics
modules.tech: Node.js/Express, CRUD APIs, SQLite, Production Debugging (Logs, Monitoring), DataDog/Sentry Basics
modules.outcome: Deployed API with Logs & Cross-Browser Testing
modules.details: Create backend services with proper persistence and production-ready monitoring. Deploy to real hosting environments.

softSkills.focus: Curiosity & Adaptability, Team Communication, Learning from Guidance
softSkills.assessment: Weekly PR Review Exercises (Scored Rubric), Daily Standups, Constructive Feedback Receptiveness
softSkills.details: Develop essential collaboration skills through structured peer reviews and daily communication rituals.

tier1.capstone: Personal Portfolio Website + API Integration Project with Production Deployment

tier2.title: Tier 2: Intermediate Developer Career Preparation
tier2.description: Produce autonomous full-stack specialists capable of independent execution, mastering system integration, robust quality assurance, and incident management.

modules.title: Advanced Frontend Engineering
modules.tech: Advanced React Hooks (useReducer, Custom Hooks), State Management (Redux/Zustand), TypeScript (Mandatory), Performance Optimization (Memoization, Throttling, Core Web Vitals)
modules.outcome: Performance-Optimized TypeScript Application
modules.details: Master complex state management and performance optimization. Mandatory TypeScript adoption across all client-side code.

modules.title: Robust API Architecture & Management
modules.tech: Node.js/Express with TypeScript, RESTful API Design, Authentication (JWT), Authorization, API Versioning, Backwards Compatibility, Migration Strategies
modules.outcome: Secure, Versioned REST API
modules.details: Design production-grade APIs with proper authentication, versioning, and migration paths for long-term maintainability.

modules.title: Data Persistence, Modeling, and Integration
modules.tech: Database Architecture (Logical & Physical Modeling), SQL (ORMs, Transactions), NoSQL (MongoDB), Database Scalability (Connection Pooling)
modules.outcome: Complex, Well-Modeled Database Schema + External API Integration
modules.details: Architect robust data models for both relational and non-relational databases. Integrate multiple complex external services.

modules.title: Production Reliability & Incident Response
modules.tech: Test-Driven Development (TDD), Critical Path Testing (Auth, Payment, Data Loss), 10+ E2E Integration Tests, Structured Logging, Monitoring/Alerting (SLOs), Error Handling, Graceful Degradation
modules.outcome: Chaos Engineering Simulation (survive 3 random failures) + Incident Response Simulation (RCA/Post-Mortem)
modules.details: Build resilient systems with comprehensive testing. Practice debugging under pressure through simulated production incidents.

softSkills.focus: Prioritization & Time Management, Advanced Creative Problem-Solving, Emotional Intelligence (EQ)
softSkills.assessment: Leading PR Review Sections (Scored Rubric), Managing Extended Scope, Technical Blog Post (Complex Concept)
softSkills.details: Navigate complex trade-offs and manage long-term projects. Lead code reviews focusing on architecture and maintainability.

tier2.capstone: Robust Full-Stack Service with Critical Path Test Coverage + Complex External Service Integration

tier3.title: Tier 3: Senior Developer Career Preparation
tier3.description: Develop strategic architects and leaders capable of translating ambiguous business requirements into actionable system architectures and driving organizational impact through influence.

modules.title: System Design Fundamentals
modules.tech: Distributed Systems (Horizontal Scaling, Load Balancing), CAP Theorem, Messaging Systems (Kafka), Advanced Caching (Consistent Hashing), Case Studies (Netflix, Uber Architecture)
modules.outcome: Comprehensive System Design Document (SDD)
modules.details: Master distributed systems architecture. Analyze real-world system designs and create comprehensive architectural documentation.

modules.title: Cloud, DevOps, and Observability
modules.tech: Cloud Fundamentals (AWS: IAM, Compute, Storage), Serverless Computing, Advanced CI/CD Pipelines, Infrastructure as Code (IaC), Container Orchestration (Kubernetes)
modules.outcome: Full DevOps Implementation Diagram (CI/CD Pipeline + IaC Structure)
modules.details: Implement production-grade cloud infrastructure. Design and document complete DevOps workflows.

modules.title: Advanced Security and Performance
modules.tech: Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA), Content Security Policy (CSP), Security Risk Management, Performance Auditing, Core Web Vitals, Optimization Techniques
modules.outcome: Security Risk Mitigation Plan + Performance Audit
modules.details: Deep dive into security hardening and performance optimization. Make autonomous decisions weighing complex trade-offs.

modules.title: Executive Leadership and Architectural Defense
modules.tech: Technical Debt Management, Quality Standards, Mentorship & Constructive Feedback, Custom API Design, Backend Framework Architecture
modules.outcome: Architectural Defense before CTO Panel (2/3 Approval Required)
modules.details: Present architecture to 3 real CTOs/Staff Engineers. Document feedback, iterate, and defend until approvalâ€”demonstrating organizational influence.

softSkills.focus: Analytical Thinking, Stakeholder Communication, Decision-Making & Risk Mitigation, Mentorship & Conflict Resolution
softSkills.assessment: Technical RFC Writing, Stakeholder Influence Simulations, CTO Panel Defense, Leading Team Code Reviews
softSkills.details: Translate technical decisions for non-technical executives. Guide junior engineers and resolve team conflicts effectively.

tier3.capstone: Architectural Review and Defense: Present to CTO Panel, Iterate Based on Feedback, Achieve 2/3 Approval

ielts.title: IELTS Preparation
ielts.role: IELTS Masterclass: Strategic Communication & Linguistic Leadership
ielts.description: Improve your communication skills for international career opportunities. Forge elite communicators capable of navigating high-stakes international environments by mastering the linguistic nuances required for global academic and professional ascendancy. This course transforms language proficiency into a strategic asset, enabling you to translate complex thought into high-impact, evaluative-ready performance.

modules.title: Language Fundamentals
modules.tech: Explore high level aspects of language including fundamentals, grammar, and vocabulary.
modules.outcome: Familiarity with language fundamentals, grammar, and vocabulary.
modules.details: Explore high level aspects of language including fundamentals, grammar, and vocabulary.

prReview.title: Soft Skills Measurement: PR Review Scoring Rubric
prReview.subtitle: Formalizing communication, EQ, and mentorship as core technical competencies across all tiers.
prReview.passingScore: Average 12/15 points across module to pass

criteria.name: Actionable Feedback Given
criteria.focus: Quality of technical guidance, adherence to best practices, clarity of writing, helpfulness to recipient

criteria.name: Graceful Response to Criticism
criteria.focus: Emotional Intelligence (EQ) & Conflict Resolution. Professional acceptance and application of constructive criticism

criteria.name: Code Improvement Demonstrated
criteria.focus: Degree of successful integration of feedback to enhance code quality, maintainability, or security
